conbody.p: Eclipse Andmore offers unsurpassed workflow ease and a unique integrated experience for developing Android applications. One installer brings you everything you need: from design to development to deployment on an Android handset to sales, with a focus on Motorola products. Eclipse Andmore saves you many steps so you can focus on creativity while maximizing productivity.
Among the many features of Eclipse Andmore are:

ul.li: Native Development: Build projects with native (C/C++) components, generate C/C++ classes from native function declarations in your Java source files.
Code Generation: Automatically generate code to access UI widgets defined in your xml-based layout files.

Device Management View: Easily create and manage AVDs (Android Virtual Devices), and set AVD startup options using the Device Management view. Use this view to quickly launch an ADB shell or Emulator Console.
Screen Capture: From the Device Management view you can easily capture an image of the screen on a real or emulated device.
Application Creation Wizards: create essential classes simply and easily, including Broadcast Receiver, Content Provider, Service, and Activity.
Drag and Drop Snippets: add often-used code from templates for more stable and better performing applications.
Application Signing: create and import certificates to sign applications.
Deploy Packages: load your applications onto a target handset or emulator with just a few clicks. Easily export zip-aligned packages (signed or unsigned) compatible with Google Play.
Eclipse Andmore Perspective: displays the most common development views by default.
Eclipse Andmore Database Perspective: allows you to view and edit SQLite databases on developer handsets and emulated devices.
Localization Files Editor: helps you to create, translate, and manage localized strings files.
